widget.name: Api Nfe
widget.description: App feito para testes na api de geração de nota fiscais eletronicas
widget.author: Marcus Vinicius Miata

content-security-policy.content: default-src 'self' data: https://ssl.gstatic.com https://fiscal.ogestor.com.br; script-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; media-src *; img-src 'self' data: content:; connect-src 'self' https://fiscal.ogestor.com.br;
